fes.autoplay: The media that tried to play (with '{{src}}') wasn't allowed to by this browser, most likely due to the browser's autoplay policy. Check out {{link}} for more information about why.

fileLoadError.bytes: It looks like there was a problem loading your file. {{suggestion}}
fileLoadError.font: It looks like there was a problem loading your font. {{suggestion}}
fileLoadError.gif: There was some trouble loading your GIF. Make sure that your GIF is using 87a or 89a encoding.
fileLoadError.image: It looks like there was a problem loading your image. {{suggestion}}
fileLoadError.json: It looks like there was a problem loading your JSON file. {{suggestion}}
fileLoadError.large: If your large file isn't fetched successfully, we recommend splitting the file into smaller segments and fetching those.
fileLoadError.strings: It looks like there was a problem loading your text file. {{suggestion}}
fileLoadError.suggestion: Try checking if the file path ({{filePath}}) is correct, hosting the file online, or running a local server. (More info at https://github.com/processing/p5.js/wiki/Local-server)
fileLoadError.table: It looks like there was a problem loading your table file. {{suggestion}}
fileLoadError.xml: It looks like there was a problem loading your XML file. {{suggestion}}
